Author: britto
Content: A future update of the mod will allow any message that starts with Battleye or [N] in front of the message to be shown in the notifications instead of the chat.

Author: britto
Content:
```xml
<message>
  <repeat>5</repeat>
    <text>
      [N]#name will shutdown in #tmin minutes.
    </text>
</message>
```

Author: britto
Content: You can also configure initial Keywords. If it detects this word at the beginning it will be shown in the notifications as well.

Author: britto
Content:
```json
{
    "ConfigVersion": "1",
    "EnableBattlEye": 1,
    "StopSpam": 1,
    "BattleEyeIcon": "Notifications/gui/data/notifications.edds",
    "BattleEyeHeading": "Server Message",
    "BattlEyeKeywords": [
        "Restart",
        "Shutdown",
        "[N]"
    ],
    "ProperOrder": 1
}
```
